item.title: Market Report Mar 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In this month’s market report, we explore the evolving landscape of artificial intelligence, API techniques, toolings, programming languages, and the intersection of design and engineering.

item.title: Market Report Feb 2024

item.description: Trends on our Radar This month has been a continuation of AI and an upwards trend on FinOps and CyberSecurity.
